meanings.definition: The quality or state of being watery.
meanings.sent1: The wateriness of the soup made it too thin.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the wateriness of the juice.
meanings.sent3: The wateriness of the rain made everyone run for cover.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shimmered with the wateriness of unshed tears.
meanings.sent5: The wateriness of the lake reflected the clear blue sky above.

meanings.definition: The presence of water or a watery substance.
meanings.sent1: The wateriness of the puddle indicated recent rainfall.
meanings.sent2: The wateriness of the drink was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The wateriness of the sauce made the pasta too soggy.
meanings.sent4: The wateriness of the ocean stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent5: The wateriness of the plant's leaves showed it needed more sunlight.
